Screen.title: TopScreen
Screen.Label: ---------- Mouse Button 1 click on field to change ----------

Help.Tip: Menu allowing user choice of stored parameter defaults.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PROCESSDEFAULTS
Menu allowing user choice of stored parameter defaults.
 
 Default = SYSTEM
 Allowed = SYSTEM
 Allowed = PROJECT
 Allowed = USER
 SYSTEM defaults are the defaults listed in the CPS documentation.
 
 PROJECT defaults are defaults the user has saved via the Save as Project
 Default button.
 
 USER defaults are defaults the user has saved via the Save as User Default
 button.

Help.Tip: File lock time in seconds.
Help.Text:
fxsort - TIME_LOCK
File lock time in seconds.
 
 Default = 60
 Allowed = 1 <= int

Help.Tip: Sort separation distance.
Help.Text:
fxsort - XY_SEPARATION
Sort separation distance.
 
 Default = 0
 Allowed = real >= 0.

Help.Tip: Set the trace gather location to that of the first trace in gather.
Help.Text:
fxsort - SET_HEADERS
Set the trace gather location to that of the first trace in gather.
 
 Default = NO
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If SET_HEADERS=NO  FXINFO will not reset header words to the xy grid.
 If SET_HEADERS=YES FXINFO will     reset header words to the xy grid.
 This will be done before any BIN_HEADERS operation and will preserve offset.

Help.Tip: Reset trace header words to the binned x,y grid.
Help.Text:
fxsort - BIN_HEADERS
Reset trace header words to the binned x,y grid.
 
 Default = NO
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If BIN_HEADERS=NO  FXINFO will not reset header words to the xy grid.
 If BIN_HEADERS=YES FXINFO will reset header words to the xy grid.
 This will be done after any SET_HEADERS operation and will not preserve
 offset.

Help.Tip: Reset trace header words to the binned x,y grid.
Help.Text:
fxsort - BIN_GATHERS
Reset trace header words to the binned x,y grid.
 
 Default = NO
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If BIN_GATHERS=NO   FXINFO will not combine spearate gathers.
 If BIN_GATHERS=YES  FXINFO will     combine spearate gathers.
 offset.

Help.Tip: Set the trace offset from the input source receiver locations.
Help.Text:
fxsort - RESET_OFFSET
Set the trace offset from the input source receiver locations.
 
 Default = NO
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If RESET_OFFSET =NO  FXINFO will not reset the input offset header word value.
 If RESET_OFFSET =YES FXINFO will     reset the input offset header word value.
 This accounts for a possible inconsistency in offset values.

Help.Tip: Header word holding old offset value.
Help.Text:
fxsort - HDR_OFFSET_OLD
Header word holding old offset value.
 
 Default = 55
 Allowed = 1<=int<=64
 The header word location for the old header word value.

Help.Tip: Header word holding new offset value.
Help.Text:
fxsort - HDR_OFFSET_NEW
Header word holding new offset value.
 
 Default = 6 = HDR_OFFSET
 Allowed = 1<=int<=64
 The header word location for the new header word value.

Help.Tip: Header word indicating the X direction.
Help.Text:
fxsort - HDR_X
Header word indicating the X direction.
 
 Default = 7
 Allowed = 1<=int<=64
 The number of image traces output may be less than X_TOT*Y_TOT
 if no input traces are ever migrated to a portion of the image.

Help.Tip: Header word indicating the Y direction.
Help.Text:
fxsort - HDR_Y
Header word indicating the Y direction.
 
 Default = 7
 Allowed = 1<=int<=64
 The number of image traces output may be less than X_TOT*Y_TOT
 if no input traces are ever migrated to a portion of the image.

Help.Tip: Save the info file for external output.
Help.Text:
fxsort - SAVE_INFO_OUT
Save the info file for external output.
 
 Default = NO
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If SAVE_INFO_OUT=NO  FXINFO will not save the info for external output.
 If SAVE_INFO_OUT=YES FXINFO will save the info file for external output.
 offset.

Help.Tip: Source gather flag.
Help.Text:
fxsort - SOURCE_GATHER
Source gather flag.
 
 Default = YES
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If SOURCE_GATHER=YES FXINFO will output info on shot gathers.
 If SOURCE_GATHER=NO  FXINFO will output info on receiver gathers.

Help.Tip: Receiver gather flag.
Help.Text:
fxsort - RECEIVER_GATHER
Receiver gather flag.
 
 Default = NO
 Allowed = YES,NO
 If RECEIVER_GATHER=NO  FXINFO will output info on shot gathers.
 If RECEIVER_GATHER=YES FXINFO will output info on receiver gathers.

Help.Tip: Number of image locations to migrate data to in the INL direction.
Help.Text:
fxsort - X_TOT
Number of image locations to migrate data to in the INL direction.
 
 Default = 101
 Allowed = int>0
 The number of image traces output may be less than X_TOT*Y_TOT
 if no input traces are ever migrated to a portion of the image.

Help.Tip: First INL image location to migrate data to.
Help.Text:
fxsort - X_INIT
First INL image location to migrate data to.
 
 Default = 0
 Allowed = real
 Units are determined by HDR_X.

Help.Tip: Last INL image location to migrate data to.
Help.Text:
fxsort - X_LAST
Last INL image location to migrate data to.
 
 Default = 100
 Allowed = real
 Units are determined by HDR_X.

Help.Tip: INL image location spacing to migrate data to.
Help.Text:
fxsort - X_INC
INL image location spacing to migrate data to.
 
 Default = 1
 Allowed = real
 Units are determined by HDR_X.

Help.Tip: Number of image locations to migrate data to in the CRL direction.
Help.Text:
fxsort - Y_TOT
Number of image locations to migrate data to in the CRL direction.
 
 Default = 1
 Allowed = int>0
 The number of image traces output may be less than X_TOT*Y_TOT
 if no input traces are ever migrated to a portion of the image.

Help.Tip: First CRL image location to migrate data to.
Help.Text:
fxsort - Y_INIT
First CRL image location to migrate data to.
 
 Default = 0
 Allowed = real
 Units are determined by HDR_Y.

Help.Tip: Last CRL image location to migrate data to.
Help.Text:
fxsort - Y_LAST
Last CRL image location to migrate data to.
 
 Default = 0
 Allowed = real
 Units are determined by HDR_Y.

Help.Tip: CRL image location spacing to migrate data to.
Help.Text:
fxsort - Y_INC
CRL image location spacing to migrate data to.
 
 Default = 1
 Allowed = real
 Units are determined by HDR_Y.

Help.Tip: Integer index number for line.
Help.Text:
fxsort - LINE_INDEX
Integer index number for line.
 
 Default = 1
 Allowed = INT

Help.Tip: Character title for line.
Help.Text:
fxsort - LINE_TITLE
Character title for line.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = CHARACTER

Help.Tip: Press button to read the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
Help.Text:
fxsort - READ_LIST
Press button to read the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
 
 When the READ_LIST button is pressed the
 FXSORT  will read the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.

Help.Tip: Press button to write the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
Help.Text:
fxsort - WRITE_LIST
Press button to write the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
 
 When the WRITE_LIST button is pressed the
 FXSORT  will write the LIST_TRIN list of sum files.
 This will only happen if OPT_TRIN=PATH_TRIN.

Help.Tip: Set trace sum files from LIST_TRIN or INFO_TRIN.
Help.Text:
fxsort - OPT_TRIN
Set trace sum files from LIST_TRIN or INFO_TRIN.
 
 Default = LIST_TRIN
 Allowed = LIST_TRIN Set trace sum files from LIST_TRIN.
 Allowed = INFO_TRIN Set trace sum files from INFO_TRIN.

Help.Tip: Output the traces internaly or externaly.
Help.Text:
fxsort - OPT_TROT
Output the traces internaly or externaly.
 
 Default = INTERNAL
 Allowed = EXTERNAL FXSORT will output traces externaly.
 Allowed = INTERNAL FXSORT will output traces internaly.
 Allowed = BOTH     FXSORT will output traces both internaly and externaly.

Help.Tip: Select the output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxsort - SELECT_INFO_TROT
Select the output trace file name.

Help.Tip: Output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxsort - INFO_TROT
Output trace file name.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: Select the output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxsort - SELECT_PATH_TROT
Select the output trace file name.

Help.Tip: Output trace file name.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PATH_TROT
Output trace file name.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: Select the list file name of sum trace files.
Help.Text:
fxsort - SELECT_LIST_TRIN
Select the list file name of sum trace files.
 
 The following is an example of a LIST_TRIN file which contains the names
 of two files.
 INFO_TRIN = (
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01a.trc ,
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01b.trc
 )

Help.Tip: List file name of sum trace files.
Help.Text:
fxsort - LIST_TRIN
List file name of sum trace files.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character
 The following is an example of a LIST_TRIN file which contains the names
 of two files.
 INFO_TRIN = (
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01a.trc ,
 /ptmp/poeplx01/scratch/hansodw/fxmig/fx01b.trc
 )

Help.Tip: List file name of sum info files.
Help.Text:
fxsort - INFO_TRIN
List file name of sum info files.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: List file name of sum trace files.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PATH_TRIN
List file name of sum trace files.
 
 Default = NONE
 Allowed = Character

Help.Tip: Button that removes this process parameter screen.
Help.Text:
fxsort - CLOSE
Button that removes this process parameter screen.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Appears only on the view-only process parameter screen.

Help.Tip: Button to accept parameter values, run traps and remove screen.
Help.Text:
fxsort - OK
Button to accept parameter values, run traps and remove screen.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that accepts parameter values, runs the parameter traps and removes
 the parameter screen.

Help.Tip: Button that accepts parameter values and runs the parameter traps.
Help.Text:
fxsort - APPLY
Button that accepts parameter values and runs the parameter traps.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that accepts parameter values and runs the parameter traps but does
 not remove the parameter screen.

Help.Tip: Button to remove the parameter screen without changing parameters.
Help.Text:
fxsort - CANCEL
Button to remove the parameter screen without changing parameters.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =

Help.Tip: Set parameters to their initial value or last applied value.
Help.Text:
fxsort - RESET
Set parameters to their initial value or last applied value.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that sets the parameters back to their values when the screen appeared
 or to their last applied value.

Help.Tip: Accept the current parameters and move to the previous process.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PROCESSLISTLEFT
Accept the current parameters and move to the previous process.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that allows the user to accept the current parameter values, run the
 parameter traps and move to the previous process in the current workfile.

Help.Tip: Menu of processes in the current workfile and their number.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PROCESSLIST
Menu of processes in the current workfile and their number.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Menu that allows the user to accept the current parameter values, run the
 parameter traps and move to any chosen process in the current workfile.

Help.Tip: Accept the current parameters and move to the next process.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PROCESSLISTRIGHT
Accept the current parameters and move to the next process.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that allows the user to accept the current parameter values, run the
 parameter traps and move to the next process in the current workfile.

Help.Tip: Save the current parameter values as Project Defaults.
Help.Text:
fxsort - PROJECTDEFAULT
Save the current parameter values as Project Defaults.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that saves the current parameter values as Project Defaults for this
 process.  There will be one set of Project Defaults for a project.

Help.Tip: Save the current parameter values as User Defaults.
Help.Text:
fxsort - USERDEFAULT
Save the current parameter values as User Defaults.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 Button that saves the current parameter values as User Defaults for this
 process.  There will be one set of User Defaults for a userid.

Help.Tip: Allows the user to access the pop-up Help Window.
Help.Text:
fxsort - HELP
Allows the user to access the pop-up Help Window.
 
 Default =
 Allowed =
 The Help Window allows access to three kinds of help:  Parameter Help, CPS
 Process Help and Application (CFE) Help.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         C P S   P R O C E S S
 
 Name       : fxsort    ( FX SORT )
 Category   : MIGRATIONS
 Written    : 2004-08-10   by: Douglas Hanson
 Revised    : 2006-04-25   by: Ioan Vlad  Remove unused variables.
 Maturity   : production
 Purpose    : Sort FX info data
 Portability: No known limitations.
 Parallel   : No
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                          GENERAL DESCRIPTION
 
 Purpose    : Sort FX info data
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                          ADVICE FOR USERS
 
 
 FXSORT is ment to be a trace header preprocess to adjust headers
 for FX imaging.
 A typical work flow might be
 
 JOB 1) write shots to a TROT file TROT_1
 
 JOB 2) Create and info file by running FXINFO with TROT_1
        as the input and INFO_1 as the output
 
 JOB 3) Run fxproject to sort shots from INFO_1 to INFO_1_GROUPED
 
 JOB 4) A) Run fxsort to read sorted shots using INFO_1_GROUPED
           and traces from TROT_1
           1)  combine gathers that fall within a distance of XY_SEPARATION
               from one another and which have a gather position has the same
               nearest image node location.
           2)  set the x,y source and receiver positions
               to the nearest image node location
           3)  set the x,y gather position ( either source or reciever)
               to the same value for all traces in a gather.
           4)  save old offset in header word 6
           5)  save new offset in header word 55
        B)  Run forward NMO using the old offset ( with DOPPLER=-1 )
        C)  Run SETWORD to swap header words 6 and 55
            to put the new offset in header word 6.
        D)  Run inverse NMO using new offset ( with DOPPLER=-1 )
        E)  Run TROT to create the new trace file TROT_2
        F)  Run FXINFO to create the new info INFO_2
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                             REVISION HISTORY
     Date        Author        Description
     ----        ------        -----------
  6  2006-04-25 Ioan Vlad      Remove unused variables.
  5  2005-05-24 Douglas Hanson Check LIST_TRIN.
  4  2005-01-31 R.S.Day        Promoted to beta.
  3  2004-08-19 Douglas Hanson Add opt_trot.
  2  2004-08-12 Douglas Hanson Use fxdata_get_info_type.
  1  2004-08-10 Douglas Hanson Original version
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
